originalText.text:
I just had such a nice experience with Daniella. I haven’t had a facial in years though I know my skin definitely can benefit from regular treatments from a professional. (One of my intentions this year is to be much better and more consistent with my skin care.)

Daniella has created a super clean and relaxing environment. She used several products including a cleanser, vitamin C serum, moisturizer and even a product with CBD oil - all focused on hydrating my skin to minimize lines and wrinkles. She also incorporated some blackhead extractions and LED light therapy, all while patiently answering all my questions.

I left feeling that my skin was finally on the right track of being properly hydrated and therefore will look more youthful and healthy. I also learned a lot about caring for my skin, which I'll incorporate into my at-home routine. I will definitely return to Daniella whenever I’m visiting NYC.

originalText.text: Daniella not only gave me the best make up application I have ever had - not kidding - but her warm and kind energy was so beautiful and calming.  She also made up our 12 year old daughter, who has Down Syndrome.  Not only did she look stunning, but Danielle was beyond kind, fun and loving.  Danielle is a special person!  I highly recommend her!!

I highly recommend her!!

originalText.text: I had a great experience with Daniella. I went for a makeup lesson and she took the time to explain to me what each step was, to explore various options, and made sure to take videos so that I can recreate these looks on my own. She also totally met me where I was at as someone who wanted to keep a natural look/vibe. Excited to take what I've learned with her and would highly recommend!

She also totally met me where I was at as someone who wanted to keep a natural look/vibe. Excited to take what I've learned with her and would highly recommend!

originalText.text: I really enjoyed my facial with Dani. It was a relaxing and calming experience, and my skin is clear and fresh as ever. I love that Dani used creams and cleansers with natural ingredients. I would definitely go again!

text.text: I really enjoyed my facial with Dani. It was a relaxing and calming experience, and my skin is clear and fresh as ever. I love that Dani used creams and cleansers with natural ingredients. I would definitely go again!

originalText.text: Daniella is such an amazing makeup artist! She did my wedding make up. She is professional and so sweet! Dani made sure my bridesmaids and I were all happy throughout the entire getting ready process! I have recommended Dani to every bride to be!
